                                                                                                                                 /*Code by fearless_coder*/
#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
   long int cp,ro,sp,ans=0;
   scanf("%ld%ld%ld",&cp,&ro,&sp);
   ans+=(cp+ro);
   if(ans>sp)
   printf("LOSS\n");
   else
   printf("PROFIT\n");
   return 0;
}
